GenAiFunction.description:
Use this action to read and deploy metadata XML definitions. Best for configuration metadata like: - PermissionSet, PermissionSetGroup, Profile (permissions, field access, object access) - Flow, FlowDefinition (automation definitions) - CustomLabel, CustomMetadata (custom settings) - ConnectedApp, NamedCredential (integrations) - GenAiPlugin, GenAiFunction (agent configuration)
Use CallToolingApi for code artifacts (ApexClass, ApexTrigger) and schema (CustomField, CustomObject). When in doubt, use SearchWeb to find which API supports that metadata type.
